mapper.select: INSERT INTO teamamember( userid, name, birth, phone, userpw, creater_name, bank_account, donation_accept, levels, status, sns, other_address ) VALUES( #{userid}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{userpw}, #{creater_name}, #{bank_account}, #{donation_accept}, 1, #{status}, #{sns}, #{other_address} )
